title: Belarus may enter Ukraine fight, actress calls Zelenskyy 'a true leader'

sentence: He had just spent about an hour listening to Republican U.S. Senate candidate Dave McCormick as he addressed several dozen people in a private room, talking about his qualifications and what separates him from the rest of the crowded primary field.

title: Republican U.S. Senate candidate Dave McCormick greets potential voters in Murrysville
